Title: Diminishes certain limitations and restrictions on emergency assistance to pay rent arrears and removes the requirement that such assistance be repaid by the recipient
Summary: Diminishes certain limitations and restrictions on emergency assistance to pay rent arrears; removes the requirement that such assistance be repaid by the recipient.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to diminishing certain limitations and restrictions on emergency assistance to pay rent arrears and removing the requirement that such assistance be repaid by the recipient
